message: Run!
I've got to do this. I've got to end it! I've got nothing left!
Good thing I'm not going anywhere.
I'm hanging in the middle of a German air raid with a Union Jack across my chest but, hey, my mobile phone's off!
You don't just give up. You don’t just let things happen. You make a stand. You say 'no.' You have the guts to do what's right when everyone else just runs away...
I am the Bad Wolf. I create myself. I take the words; I scatter them in time and space — a message to lead myself here.
I can see everything. All that is. All that was. All that ever could be.
Rose, before I go, I just wanna tell you: you were fantastic, absolutely fantastic. And you know what? — So was I!
He's got two hearts.
Anything else he's got two of?
Oh, I'm, I'm dazed and confused. I've been chasing this... this wee-naked child over hill and over dale. Ain't that right, ya... tim'rous beastie?
Does he still stroke bits of the TARDIS?
If you want to know what's going on, work in the kitchen.
Well if you think that's gonna be trouble, we can always get back inside and go somewhere else.
Maybe Lucy's a bit thick.
I said not blue!
No, I'm not really a cat person. Once you've been threatened by one in a nun's wimple, it kind of takes the joy out of it.
How long are you going to stay with me?
Forever.
I made my choice a long time ago, and I'm never gonna leave you.
I love you.
And I suppose, if it's my last chance to say it...Rose Tyler-
